nodes.text: Knights was a MC80a Star Cruiser belonging to the Rebel Alliance.

The cruiser along with a Bothan Dreadnaught-class heavy cruiser called Doomer were attempting a secret meeting. However the Imperials had sent a strike force consisting of Missile Boats, one of the starfighters piloted by Tan Maarek Stele, TIE Avengers and Gamma-class ATR-6 assault transports to capture the Rebel Cruiser and destroy the Bothan Dreadnaught.

Stele cleared a minefield, destroyed all starfighter opposition, destroyed the Dreadnaught and reduced the cruiser's shields and the ship was successfully disabled and captured along with the Nebulon-B2 frigate Tarken.
